trans-unit.source: Runs a set of child activities at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 자식 활동 집합을 동시에 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: The order in which child activities are run is non-deterministic.
trans-unit.target: 자식 활동이 실행되는 순서가 명확하지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>입니다. 즉, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>는 다른 활동을 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> activity is the only activity that can be the child of a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> 활동은 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>의 자식일 수 있는 유일한 활동입니다.

trans-unit.source: Only one activity can run at a time.
trans-unit.target: 한 번에 하나의 활동만 실행할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> only finishes when all children are complete.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>는 모든 자식이 완료된 경우에만 종료됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> is especially useful when there are one or more blocking activities, such as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> activity, in one or more of the branches.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>는 하나 이상의 분기에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> 활동과 같은 차단 활동이 한 개 이상 있는 경우 특히 유용합니다.

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> actually switches to a different branch when the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> is blocked.
trans-unit.target: 이 시나리오에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity>가 차단되면 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>는 실제로 다른 분기로 전환됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If there are no blocking activities in any one of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> branches then the activity uses a non-deterministic sequence.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> 분기 중 하나에 차단 활동이 없는 경우 활동에서 명확하지 않은 시퀀스를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class, add the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class, and add two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> classes to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만들고, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> 클래스를 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> 클래스에 추가하고, 두 개의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> 클래스를 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> 클래스에 추가하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the WhileAndParallel SDK sample from the WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs 파일에 있는 WhileAndParallel SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Using While and Parallel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [사용 하는 동안 및 병렬](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84)합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new instance of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class, add the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> class, and add two <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> classes to the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: 다음 코드 예제에서는 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 만들고, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> 클래스를 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WhileActivity> 클래스에 추가하고, 두 개의 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> 클래스를 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity> 클래스에 추가하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the WhileAndParallel SDK Sample from the WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: 이 코드 예제는 WhileAndParallelWorkflow.Designer.cs 파일에 있는 WhileAndParallel SDK 샘플의 일부입니다.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Using While and Parallel](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [사용 하는 동안 및 병렬](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/776a25cc-6aed-4754-b680-996213831b84)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동의 사용자 정의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity" /> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: 활동 이름을 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ParallelActivity" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트를 발생시킨 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The previously-typed event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 이전에 입력된 이벤트 인수입니다.

trans-unit.source: Defines the processing procedure when the subscribed-to event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 구독 대상 이벤트가 발생할 때의 처리 절차를 정의합니다.
